Module Screen
Package Foundation

Class DB

java.lang.Object
Foundation.DB
public class DB extends Object
Database wrapper for JBDC. Specific methods for retrieving data for the operation of the pomodoro schedule application. Manual connect and disconnect. Database to be connected to specified in configuration file in root folder.
Author:
Esben Christensen

  • Method Details

    • getInstance

      public static DB getInstance()
      Gets the singleton instance of the DB class. If it is not created one will be created.
      Returns:
      The singleton instance.

    • connect

      public void connect()
      Establishes a connection to the database.

    • disconnect

      public void disconnect()
      Disconnects the connection to the database.

    • validateConnection

      public boolean validateConnection()
      Validates the connection to the server.
      Returns:
      True if connection is valid, false if otherwise.

    • getDatabaseName

      public String getDatabaseName()
      Returns the databse name that should be used when connecting to the databse server.
      Returns:
      the database name for future connections.

    • setDatabaseName

      public void setDatabaseName(String dbName)
      Sets the database name that the DB class should connect to. In order to change databse, it is necessary to disconnect and reconnect.
      Parameters:
      dbName - the name of the database in the MS SQL server

    • getConsultantsInOffice

      public ArrayList<Consultant> getConsultantsInOffice(String officeName)
      Invokes stored procedure that takes a String officeName, and returns associated Consultants
      Parameters:
      officeName - The office name of which to get Consultants
      Returns:
      ArrayList of the Consultants in given office

    • getWorkdaysOfConsultant

      public void getWorkdaysOfConsultant(Consultant consultant, String dateTime)
      Invokes stored procedure that takes Consultant id, and gets the Workdays of the given Consultant.
      Parameters:
      consultant - Consultant of which to get Workdays
      dateTime - The point in time after which workdays are queried.

    • getPomodorosInWorkday

      public void getPomodorosInWorkday(Workday workday)
      Invokes stored procedure that takes Workday id, and gets back Pomodoros of the workday. These are then put into the given Workday.
      Parameters:
      workday - The workday of which to get Pomodoros

    • getStatusOfConsultant

      public void getStatusOfConsultant(Consultant consultant)
      Invokes stored procedure that takes Consulant id, and gets the current Status of the given Consulant.
      Parameters:
      consultant - Consultant of which to get the current status

    • getWorkdayUpdated

      public boolean getWorkdayUpdated(Workday workday)
      Queries the workday for updates. If there are updates overwrite the workday.
      Parameters:
      workday - Workday to query for updates.
      Returns:
      true if update received, false otherwise
